author: notocactus
created_time: July 16, 2022, 10:47:31 AMLast edit: February 21, 2025, 01:04:27 PM by notocactus
content: Local rules:Allowed posts in this thread: updates about appearance, disapperance, inactive, reactive status of a service.If you want to discuss something, please do it in Reputation, Service Discussion or Scam accusation.Please don't over spam this thread with discussion about any service of anyone.In this topic, don't judge quality (good, bad, scam) of any service. If you give me a post, update about it, that is a good update/ warning/ signal, just don't over discuss about it hereI only list campaign managers and management services for campaigns paid in Bitcoin BTC. Some of them also provide bounty management, but I don't list bounty management services hereI can list or reject to list any service and manager here. Personal thread, personal choice as initially I create this thread for my personal use. If I reject to list any service here, and you still want to promote it, let's shill it else where.Being listed here does not mean that service is good. Not being listed here does not mean that service is bad. Please do your own research.For service providers who have yet create Service Announcement threads, please do it and ping me to update with relevant linksI know some managers are doing management for their own companies as official company representatives, so I don't name them here. Because they will probably not use these accounts to manage other campaignsI much appreciate community help to update this thread, but please only ping me about lively services. For inactive services, please don't ping me!Please: Don't spam and use any bumping service, require newbies in your campaign to shill your service here!Overview of Bitcointalk Services from Another objective is keep it updating. A few threads in reference is inactive and OPs likely left the forum.QuoteI can only say is, accounts that has negative reviews especially those who are unlawfully labeled here as a scammer or encourage scams should not be in the list.Because to me, it sounds like you are still suggesting to use their service even though they were labeled as scammers in any way.OPs of services that have issues will have a * but that's it. If there is just discussions and unclear, not finalized yet, I will not remove their services from the list.Quote from: bitmover on July 18, 2022, 12:49:13 AMI would like to add my website sponsored content to that list of yours.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391840.msg59675049#msg59675049Welcome. I know your site (bitcoindata.science) and we had some discussions in the past but I have yet know you started to open it for advertisement. Anyway, great works!Quote from: bullrun2020bro on July 17, 2022, 09:38:58 PMIf you don't mind, could you please add my thread to the "Avatar for rent" section: bullrun2020bro Forum Space For Rent [Signature + Avatar + Text + Website]Welcome. He typically bumps it every day.I know mprep started to bump his service since one year ago, perhaps.QuoteIn addition, can I request if you could change the link to my new service thread when it is published because I plan to redesign it and change the prices. Thank you so much!! I know you have multiple service threads but please give me a link what is a service you want to add here. ¬†If you see any interesting Free service (should be from trusted members or from quality team), please ping me. This thread has space for it.Forum advertising space for free signature/avatar advertisement

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: The ‚Äòrank column‚Äô stands for the current rank of the user, isn't it? Seems like you have messed up the rank of some users in the list.In the ‚ÄòGraphic Designers List‚Äô: n0nce rank will be Sr. Member. NAVI12 rank will be Member.In the ‚ÄòCampaign Managers List‚Äô: BTC_Mouse rank will be Member. Carollzinha & joeperry rank will be Full Member. julerz12, Murat, TalkStar, Little Mouse & suzanne5223 rank will be Hero Member, In the ‚ÄòLending Service List‚Äô: shasan rank will be Hero Member.In the ‚ÄòTranslators List‚Äô: dwminer1 rank will be Hero Member.BTW, what you think about bitcointalk escrow services? (Recommended bitcointalk escrow services)I know how hard it is to maintain this type of thread by gathering the information. I hope you will try to update the list as long as you are active in the forum. Keep it up!

Seems like you have messed up the rank of some users in the list.I thank you for your support. Indeed, I forgot to edit the member rank after copy and paste. Only edit username, UID and topic link. It's my mistake. All corrected now.In later posts (not OP), I remembered to do it at beginning so no or less mistakes than in OP QuoteI know how hard it is to maintain this type of thread by gathering the information. I hope you will try to update the list as long as you are active in the forum. Keep it up!I am going to try my best to keep it updated regularly. comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Does Carollzinha provide campaign management service for other project as well? I don't think so. She is only handling the stake signature campaign and she is one of their internal employee as far as I know. You can PM her to know.By the way, you have made a list of "ALL in ONE". Don't you think it will be hard for you to maintain/update the list? Just my 2 cent, TranDzung.Great list though.

There are something is missing such as Escrow, Collectibles etc. I don't think I will put everything in this topic.¬† Additionally, I much appreciate community help to keep this topic updated (clearly presented in OP too). Community can do it, just like how they do it in Overview of Bitcointalk Signature-Ad CampaignsIt is already 8 years old and I am sure Mitchell would have not managed to keep that topic lively without community supportQuoteGreat list though.Thanks.
